MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.47am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Clocklawfoot and are patrolling the overhead line to locate the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.32am on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
